docs: the king bedthat is not a king bed .well stocked bathroom with nice complimentary toiletries .i did forget to mention when i checked out that the lamp was very dusty - not what i would expect for a £ 300 room rate .bathroom was clean and its lovely that they turn your bed down at night ! </DOC> the tv remote did not work properly and the ipod docking station was for the old type of connection , which is very very outdated .first , there was a distinct smell of drains that seemed to pervade my room and the corridor outside on the 21st floor .the rooms are clean and functional , the bathroom is big , and the views from the room is nice . for my walks , i went to hyde park , green park .the lobbies & hallways look dated and are in need of renovation .was at the hotel at 3:00 p.m. and room was not ready . </DOC> the bathroom was immaculate .it 's some of the small things which prevent a top review such as the disgusting shower heads in both of our rooms , which urgently need to be cleaned of calc . or the stained carpets which does n't look very inviting .the suite was spotlessly clean , comfortable and fully equipped .the lack of shower curtains in the bathrooms has been mentioned elsewhere .lift system to room really effective which was important as hotel based on 28 floors rooms clean , well equipped and beds comfortable .
